name: CLARK COUNTY NV (OFFICE OF THE COUNTY MANAGER)
sampleDescriptions:
Monitored Grant Opportunities and Announcements 
HR 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act 2018
National Preparedness Grants; FEMA grants for State and Local Governments included the Urban Area Security Initiative (UASI) grant funding and implementation and firefighter SAFER grant funding
Public land policies related to the BLM Resource Management Plan for Las Vegas/Pahrump (no legislation introduced).
